snippet.title: Inside The Loop Trailer - a free Ludum Dare 47 game
snippet.description:
INSIDE THE LOOP is a free atmospheric adventure game where you control a nameless character stuck in a mega loop.

Built during 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam.

Heavily inspired by the amazing INSIDE by Playdead, we tried to construct an atmospheric experience that can be enjoyed by everyone.

Play for free in the browser or download on:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/inside-the-loop
https://satolas.itch.io/inside-the-loop

A mysterious journey inside a constantly turning loop. Dive deep inside and see if you can find the exit.

Made by
Adrian Galeazzi https://twitter.com/SatolasGames
Mikołaj Bazaczek https://twitter.com/aerloth

Made with Unity, 3DSMax, Photoshop, AbletonLive, Audacity.
